metadata.title: CVE-2019-9717 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In Libav 12.3, a denial of service in the subtitle decoder allows attackersto hog the CPU via a crafted video file in Matroska format, becausesrt_to_ass in libavcodec/srtdec.c has a complex format argument to sscanf.

criterions.comment: qtwebengine-opensource-src package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
gst-libav1.0 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
